text:
Fatal accident closed I-70 in both directions Thursday morning

A fatal accident closed a portion of Interstate 70 in both directions Thursday morning in Frederick, according to state police. Maryland State Police said troopers were called to a two-vehicle collision in the area of eastbound I-70 at mile marker 60 in New Market. Rroopers found that the vehicles involved included a tanker truck and a passenger car. The car was fully engulfed in flames and a person was found dead inside. An adult man who was...
